content: the **tiny magic frog** is a **bonus free pattern** to stretch your fingers and oil your crochet wand before the official start of **amigurumi school of magic 5** > download this tiny free pattern to have taste a little of our school of magic mystery cal **early-bird sign-ups are opened until the 28th of september ** the is worked in one piece starting from the top of the head with arms and legs made as you go the pattern is written in us crochet terms with step-by-step images to guide you along the way the project can be made with your preferred yarn the sample was made in dk-weight cotton with 3 0mm hook
